title: Shadow Clone Study Sprint
description: Master the art of focused learning through short, intense study sessions. Build your foundation as a Knowledge Hunter by establishing consistent daily learning habits.

tasks.title: 15-Minute Knowledge Burst
tasks.description: Study any topic of your choice for exactly 15 minutes using the Pomodoro technique
tasks.completion_criteria: Complete one 15-minute focused study session

tasks.completion_criteria: Log 3 specific insights or facts learned

title: Mana Meditation for Focus
